dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, I always thought tick season was a summer thing, but apparently, the peak is right now in April and May.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, I always thought tick season was a summer thing, but apparently, the peak is right now in April and May.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanitary doctors say the peak period for tick activity traditionally falls in April and May.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely, and it's already a huge issue in Almaty. They've had 186 people seeking help for bites since March, and almost half of those were children.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely, and it's already a huge issue in Almaty. They've had one hundred eighty six people seeking help for bites since March, and almost half of those were children.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A total of 186 people, including 89 children, have sought medical help in Almaty since early March due to tick bites, citing KTK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a sharp increase they're reporting. And get this—out of the ticks they've tested so far, one actually carried the encephalitis antigen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a sharp increase they're reporting. And get this-out of the ticks they've tested so far, one actually carried the encephalitis antigen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There has been a sharp increase in tick activity in Almaty. One sample tested positive for the tick-borne encephalitis antigen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, which is really serious. That one came from Almaty Region, according to Asel Kalykova from the Sanitary Department.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, which is really serious. That one came from Almaty Region, according to Asel Kalykova from the Sanitary Department.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the patient, the bite occurred in Almaty Region, said Asel Kalykova, Deputy Head of the Almaty Department of Sanitary and Epidemiological Control.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So what are they doing about it? Are they spraying or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what are they doing about it? Are they spraying or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, specialized teams are already out treating parks, wooded areas, public gardens—over 4,500 hectares total.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, specialized teams are already out treating parks, wooded areas, public gardens-over four thousand, five hundred hectares total.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Specialized teams are spraying wooded areas, parks, and public gardens. More than 4,500 hectares are expected to be treated, with the campaign costing the city budget 144 million tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a massive area. And it's costing the city budget 144 million tenge, which is no small amount.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a massive area. And it's costing the city budget one hundred forty four million tenge, which is no small amount.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 4,500 hectares are expected to be treated, with the campaign costing the city budget 144 million tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And they're urging people to wear light-colored, tightly woven clothes and high boots if they're going into grassy or forested spots.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And they're urging people to wear light-colored, tightly woven clothes and high boots if they're going into grassy or forested spots.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To reduce the risk of tick bites, health officials recommend wearing light-colored, tightly woven clothing that covers the body and high boots.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Good advice. And if you do get bitten, don't just pull it off yourself—go straight to a trauma center.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good advice. And if you do get bitten, don't just pull it off yourself-go straight to a trauma center.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If bitten, residents are advised to seek immediate medical attention at trauma centers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Watch for symptoms like fever, chills, fatigue... even nausea or swelling around the bite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Watch for symptoms like fever, chills, fatigue... even nausea or swelling around the bite.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Key symptoms include fever, chills, fatigue, nausea, and swelling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's scary how such a tiny bug can cause so much trouble. Stay safe out there, folks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's scary how such a tiny bug can cause so much trouble. Stay safe out there, folks.
